column5: Forget Leafs V. Sens.  This years matchups are proving to be relentlessly physical, high scoring, great goaltending.  NSH V. SJ is WILD so is WILD v. DUCKS.  4 overtimes on day 1?   Go Leafs Go...2008  I hope the Pens can pull out of the first round.

Gotta watch!!! Even though the Leafs are out, there is still some good hockey. You actually forget how good it is until you start watching it .......... playoffs are sure different. Wish they were there
Nope...now that the leafs are out of it and the Blue Jays are back I'll wait until they get it all sorted out for the finals for the Stanley Cup...  Go Leafs Go (next year)  make that Go Jays GO
Agreed, but the Sabres are going all the way.
There's a big difference in "going all the way" and "winning it all", ask Marv Levy. -Brian
love this time of year!!! bringing a few more empty's back every week!
I love the caliber of the game at this time of year! Step up or go home.
